G

getIssue() - Method in class gs.spri.raven.core.Token
[REQUIRED] The date and time that this authentication response was created.
getLifeEnd() - Method in class gs.spri.raven.core.Token
[OPTIONAL] If the user has established an authenticated 'session' with the WLS, this indicates the remaining life (in seconds) of that session.
getSig() - Method in class gs.spri.raven.core.Token
[REQUIRED if status is 200, OPTIONAL otherwise] A public-key signature of the response data constructed from the entire parameter value except 'kid' and 'signature' (and their separating '!' characters) using the private key identified by 'kid', the SHA-1 hash algorithm and the 'RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5' scheme as specified in PKCS #1 v2.1 [RFC 3447] and the resulting signature encoded using the base64 scheme [RFC 1521] except that the characters '+', '/', and '=' are replaced by '-', '.' and '_' to reduce the URL-encoding overhead.
getSignedString() - Method in class gs.spri.raven.core.Token
The plaintext of which 'sig' purports to be the signature.
getStatusString() - Method in exception gs.spri.raven.RavenAuthenticationException
Returns a human-readable interpretation of the status code.
getToken() - Method in class gs.spri.raven.RavenAuthenticator
Returns the authentication token most recently received from the Raven server.
getToken(HttpSession) - Method in class gs.spri.raven.RavenServlet
Returns the authentication token associated with 'ses' or 'null'.
getUserName(HttpSession) - Method in class gs.spri.raven.RavenServlet
Returns the identifier of the logged in principal associated with 'ses', or 'null'.
gs.spri.raven - package gs.spri.raven
High level classes to make use of the raven authentication service.
gs.spri.raven.core - package gs.spri.raven.core
Low level classes representing the authentication process, the request to raven and the token it returns.

K

V

validateTokenAgainstRequest(Request, Token) - Method in class gs.spri.raven.core.Authenticator
Validates a token and request object, using the configured key-store to do cryptographic verification of the token and checking against the request object to ensure that the token is one that matches the request.
ver - Variable in class gs.spri.raven.core.Request
[REQUIRED] The version of the WLS protocol in use.
ver - Variable in class gs.spri.raven.core.Token
[REQUIRED] The version of the WLS protocol in use.
